Html:
http://elitistjerks.com/f78/t83763-proc_items_needle_encrusted_scorpion_et_al/#2

I'm reasonably sure the Devs here are already monitoring this thread but for those of you (like me) that like to try to model them by hand until they are put into Rawr this link should be useful.

Bump.  Looking at the current release perhaps this EJ thread has been missed.  Or is there another thread that contradicts it?

Diffs from EJ vs Rawr:

- Needle Encrusted should be 50 sec ICD

- Rev/Exalt DPS rings should import as 60 sec ICD and 1 PPM

- Deathbringers proc rate is 45-50%

I'm surprised that Needle-Encrusted Scorpion would have a 50 sec iCD. Wowhead says 45 seconds. Most proc trinkets have 45 seconds. Why would this one have 50 seconds iCD?

Maybe someone could further investigate it.

Trolando wrote:

I'm surprised that Needle-Encrusted Scorpion would have a 50 sec iCD. Wowhead says 45 seconds. Most proc trinkets have 45 seconds. Why would this one have 50 seconds iCD?

Maybe someone could further investigate it.

There may be another source that refutes this guy.  He seems to be rather professional about things though.

Has someone found another source refuting this poster?  They have a item named after them in ICC for their theory-crafting work :P. 

http://www.wowhead.com/?item=50021

The differences may seem small but they definitely change my optimizer results.  Especially the ring and needle.

Interestingly enough the proc rate on DBW doesn't seem to affect the DPS.  Probably due to the length of the CD.

Astrylian wrote:

No, just haven't gotten to it.

Cool beans.  It had just been a few versions so I figured it was worth a bump.  I'll just adjust them on my local copy again for now!  Thank you!
Yep, thanks. Did you post this in the issue tracker?

Astrylian wrote:

Yep, thanks. Did you post this in the issue tracker?

I didn't.  I will now.  Back when I posted originally I wasnt sure if it was "good data" haha.  I will post one now.
